website_summaries.verdict: If you need a water-resistant, weatherproof set, this is an acceptable choice.
pros: Weatherproof boards are strong and stand up to wet, humid conditions
Game includes built-in storage for the bags and handles for carrying
cons: The boards are more durable than the legs and brackets, which feel a bit wobbly and occasionally collapse

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw, product lasted 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a weatherproof board. Unfortunately the mechanism to hold the board up at angle relies on small dimples in the plastic. One board lays completely flat on the ground and has been used once only. We did not walk on it or apply any pressure. I cannot imagine this is not happening to others. Unfortunately I am told I’ve missed my return window by 3 days. Would avoid this product based on major design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy - Back Support Issue
customer_reviews.text: Great weatherproof idea, terrible support. I read the reviews and didn't listen, now all 4 units I purchased lay flat in a high end downtown hotel. I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Weak construction
customer_reviews.text: Researched and really wanted an all weather board. These came and we set them up, they are not the same height. The board "stands" by being held by a plastic board. Not the best and I'm disappointed, plastic notches won't hold one board up.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: We saw a set of these cornhole boards at the beach. We asked the players where they got them from and they said Amazon. We ordered a set the next week. We have already used them on the beach ourselves. We love the fact that they are weatherproof and not as heavy as a wooden set.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Quality manufacturing, poor implimentation
customer_reviews.text: The game was received when specified in great condition, but was missing the bags. I have requested that the vendor send me the missing bags, but I have note received them yet. I purchase an new set for now until I get the originals ordered. I like the quality of the product I received, but I could not play the game until I purchased bags. The weather resistance material is durable and sturdy, with underneath storage for the bags and the two boards snap together for better storage and transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and the humidity and heat quickly ruin wood products. We play a lot of cornhole so these boards seemed perfect. A day or so after they arrived we noticed that one of the boards had a small crack. I emailed the company and they immediately took care of everything. They mailed out a new set of replacement boards with minimal hassle. I appreciate a company that stands behind their products. I’ve already recommended these boards to our friends who were impressed but how much nicer they were than their cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Board made in the USA but the bean bags are made in China
customer_reviews.text: Duped into thinking that I am supporting the American economy and giving my family a fun outdoor activity. The latter is true - mostly because we love being outdoors and it doesn't take much to entertain us; the former statement is is based on the bean bags having a tag that reads: "Made in China". The board is USA made, but the accessories to use with the board are from China. They don't tell you that on the website because they want you to think that you are buying a 100% manufactured in USA item. The game is fine - the bags slide a bit too much off the plastic, but not 100% a USA product.
customer_reviews.author: Thankful Grateful Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun. Super durable.
customer_reviews.text: Pull these bad boys out of the box, and you're ready to go. High quality bags that don't leak. The plastic construction of the boards holds up well to toddlers that want to climb all over them. The design of the boards is such that they have hand-holds on the sides for carrying them around, and they store easily in a small area. Highly recommend compared to other wooden options.
customer_reviews.author: TunaDonut

customer_reviews.title: weather proof is mostly why i bought it
customer_reviews.text: this product is made from hard plastic. It folds flat. I store them under my pool table. The bean bags have a good weight to them. Not cheap lightweight ones. I thought this would be a good option in case the kids forget to bring them inside after use. Wood ones would probably be damaged by rain. But these ones will hopefully last forever.
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought
customer_reviews.text: Given the mixed reviews with it falling over , I was hesitant to buy. But I'm glad I did. It hasn't caused me a problem yet, and I really like the for the weather proof benefits. They perform well too. Even if mine does collapse, like the others claims, it is easily fixed with a little ingenuity, like a screw to make the dimples larger
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these mostly for our own backyard but also to bring to parties! I immediately used my cricut to personalize them with vinyl which has already held up in strong rain. We also purchased lights to attach to these as well. They're amazing, everyone loves them! They're a bit bouncy and slippery but once you get to know the boards you'll be pro in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Glesias

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Returned it after one use. Bags broke apart and aftr one use in the driveway it seemed to become soft and uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph F.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We had a cheap cornhole game that broke after one season, so I got this heavy duty one that will hopefully withstand my family of 5's heavy use! We took it to the park for a play date with friends and the kids and adults all enjoyed playing with it. It's sturdy and well made and portable. I like how the two pieces of the set fit together like a puzzle and the bags have their own storage compartment.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBriDavis

customer_reviews.title: What fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy - nice to not have to worry about bringing it in if it rains. Recommend it highly - buy it - you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine K. Trombley

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate weather proof outdoor game, quality bags, awesome design!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much that we have bought multiple sets over the years, two for us and others as gifts. Awesome customer service too and lots of other games available including much cheaper and smaller options like mdf/wood based games for last minute parties and gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Gravytrain

customer_reviews.title: Great weatherproof boards
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these boards for a business where they would need to be outside 24/7. The wooden boards before these warped and started falling apart. These boards are portable, lightweight, and weatherproof. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a school
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my child’s school and the kids love it at recess. Some kids just don’t like playground equipment and this keeps them active and engaged. It also facilitates taking turns and encouraging each other. Adults love it also. Since it is weatherproof we can just leave it outside.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Item is overpriced for what you get. You have to be careful, because it's usually damaged. You been shipping, two of the corners where slightly damaged, and once they are Denton inn, they're very difficult to correct. Needless to say, stepping on one or falling on one the wrong way, would pretty much ended it I would think
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Solid. A bit more bounce than a good quality wood set, but everything can get wet! They slide a bit on smooth surfaces, so add a bit of grip tape to the bottom "legs" if necessary. My guess is that a toddler would break the legs if they jumped on it so keep the little kids away.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product I really like the fact that you can leave it out in the weather and you’re not worried about it like a wooden corn hole game. I also like the fact that it has storage built in to keep the bags so you don’t lose them. The only downside to these is that when it’s sunny out they reflect so much light back that it can be hard to look at them. Maybe they can be stained or get a vinyl cover for them.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: bags do not last - used 3 times and they disintegrated
customer_reviews.text: I thought this board would be amazing. Definitely easy to set up but the bags are of a poor quality - the fabric is on the thin side. They ended up splitting and not on the seams. Almost as if they disintegrated- not a hole that can be stitched or fixed but all over the fabric broke down. A friend's set (wooden not plastic) has much more substantial bags that are much better. For another $20 buy the regulation one with the proper bags. I am now having to get replacement bags for $20 so no savings at all. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: eam144

customer_reviews.title: Nice but no storage/transport case
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set and I really like that it is waterproof. It would be helpful if it had a storage/transport case. It's also a bit "bouncy" when the sacks hit, but still a lot of fun! Sort of wish I had bought the smaller version that has a locking mechanisms to facilitate storage/transport.
customer_reviews.author: C B-True

customer_reviews.title: ORANGE
customer_reviews.text: They seem well made and should last a long time. I was expecting white as the picture and title describes but instead we received a very bright orange set with black and orange bean bags. I'm not really picky on the color but it was a shock when we opened the box so if you want white, you may want to confirm with seller before they ship it that you will actually get white!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn W

customer_reviews.title: great but be carefull
customer_reviews.text: the stands are not very strong and can be easily broken by a little clumsy kid walking on them.....other than that i love these......just wish they came with a way to snap them together for transporting but the onboard bag storage is a huge plus
customer_reviews.author: M. Marc

customer_reviews.title: Buy a from a different company!
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor design. My family got to enjoy this game for less than two months. I will be purchasing from other outdoor game companies in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits the need of weatherproof, however the stops for ...
customer_reviews.text: fits the need of weatherproof, however the stops for the leg is made to small. did not hold up to a weekend of play before it pushed by the stop enough that it no longer holds there giving the boards very little incline.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch laganiere

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!! DAMGED UPON OPENING
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged when opened. You guys need to do a better job of packing
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Bags broke on first use, seller is unreachable so I think I have to return the whole thing?
customer_reviews.text: I used it at one party and the first game we had 4 bags burst open (playing on grass) after that, my boss' children proceeded to climb all over these and test out their strength. Not what I would call "lightweight" but definitely transportable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!  Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy!! Very good quality. I'm sure we will enjoy these for years to come! We ruined a wooden set by leaving it outside while it was raining. This set will work great and be weather resistant if that happens again. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: GOOD QUALITY WITH NICE LITTLE BAG STORAGE COMPARTMENT WHERE LEG FOLDS DOWN.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine B. Stojkov

customer_reviews.title: huge
customer_reviews.text: This game is plastic, very white, and large. Too large, IMO. It's awkward to move. However, it's just as fun as smaller versions.
customer_reviews.author: Jo E. Meyertons

customer_reviews.title: High quality but not very portable
customer_reviews.text: These are super durable and larger than a typical corntoss set made of wood. Be aware they're heavy and not easily portable but if they're going to be used in in a single place, they are perfect. If you do need to move them, there is a small indented handle in the plastic on each side to carry them. The bags are also easily stored in the bottom when not in use (the support piece folds down and locks to keep them in place).
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. . . I think
customer_reviews.text: Really have little to compare this with. Bought it to use in our neighborhood as a "mixer." It's certainly NOT something you can sling over your shoulder and chuck it down the street. Weighs an awkward 30/40+ pounds. I expect we'll learn to love it. Too soon to tell. But the plastic seems sturdy and durable. It's what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne L Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Fine But Bean Bags Busted Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The board is what it is....a plastic board. Storage underneath is a nice feature. However, many of the bean bags spli or ripped open within 3 weeks so now we have to look for replacements already. Kond of dissapointing since we have been slamming them or using a highly abrasive surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Florida humidity and rain approved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beach, family gatherings, parties.. never have to worry about the weather or the boards warping because of florida dew and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: What you'd expect from plastic boards. Nothing fancy,but work well. Best benefit is that they are so lightweight !
customer_reviews.author: kevin o'connor

customer_reviews.title: Won't Last!
customer_reviews.text: We agonized over which corn hole set to purchase and ended up choosing this one because we knew we would want to use it for years to come... It worked for the one party, but doesn't stand anymore and would look awful if it were taped. If I bought one in the future, I'd either make it myself, buy a handmade wood version locally, or buy a really cheap one knowing that it won't last. For $20-40 more I could have bought a hand-made wood one locally. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Everyone enjoyed this game during our family Thanksgiving holiday
customer_reviews.text: This arrived as expected in good condition and it was very easy to setup. Many people played and enjoyed this during our family gathering. It is study and I believe it will be fun for everyone for years.
customer_reviews.author: ManCaver

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this cornhole set and the company that I bought it from. It's extremely heavy duty plastic, which I intentionally chose as I know it will mostly live outside. My brother got the same set for his family and I was impressed at how durable it is. I loved that I purchased it on Monday, it shipped on Tuesday, and I had it in hand on Thursday. What else is there to say? Fabulous!!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Momo3Reds

customer_reviews.title: Bounce during play
customer_reviews.text: They are heavier than I thought, but bounce and move during play.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: The Bean Bags are REALLY cheap
customer_reviews.text: We've only had the game less than a week and the bean bags have split at the seams and lost their beans. :( The board itself is nice for weatherproofing but because it's plastic the bags bounce extra high and the bags slide a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Banul

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The Game boards are very nice. However one of our was defective and it has to be returned. It was a gift that I had shipped to friends for an event. That was disappointing. We were able to prop up the defective board and played on. Replacement on its way.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Grunwald

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for what I need. Kids are having a great time with it. Just inform them that they are not a bicycle ramps and are not for standing or jumping on and they should last just fine.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Very sturdy. Like how it sto res the bean bags.
customer_reviews.author: nothing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it!! I've been through so many cornhole boards and they never last but this one is actually going to last a long time and even has a spot to keep the bags! Awesome buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: The play is not the same as a wood board. Bags dont slide and the board bounces a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Schimmelpfennig

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Fun game
customer_reviews.text: We had fun playing this on our driveway. One of the bean bags began to rip after a few games. The quick fix was a stapler. The boards seem fine but just a little light weight. The bags can actually push the boards out of position. But it was still fun!
customer_reviews.author: lindap

customer_reviews.title: love the game itself
customer_reviews.text: love the game itself, and the durability of the plastic, but had to return the first two because they arrived damaged - most likely dropped on corners during transit.
customer_reviews.author: smg

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to a 7yr old and he loves it!! It is great for outside but a little heavy. For those that live in the snow belt as I do, you can put it in the basement and still play in the winter!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good Corn Toss Set
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised how well these have held up after many games of torture. Bags have fallen in the lake and usually float long enough to scoop them out; once dried out they play like new. Main difference between this durable plastic molded board and a traditional wooden one is the bounce. Do to the leg braces the bags will hop a big more and the light board may slide if not on soft ground.
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: Is better than I thought it would nr
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is MOT wood and that we can put stickers on it from all of our travel spots. The built in bean bag holder is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: SueZahn

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: Brother in law owned one. Loved playing when visiting. Got one for self
customer_reviews.author: AzWildCat

customer_reviews.title: Really well made and convenient storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, knowing all too well that it would be left out unintentionally and rained on. After we used it we left it our because there was no rain in the forecast. We had forgotten about the sprinklers .The company didn't offer prime shipping but they shipped out just as fast. It is well made and worth the little more that it costs to be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Hellenic

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun already put into these and no sign of wear
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than expected (which is good). Play is almost the exact same as a wooden board. They will slide if used on tile, concrete or wood so either add rubber tabs to the bottom put something heavy behind them. One bottom corner was dented in during shipping but it doesn't affect play. Hours of fun already put into these and no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: lhall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! Love using them with my younger kiddos without worrying about them falling onto the wood ones
customer_reviews.author: Odjib20

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for family gatherings and to have outside
customer_reviews.author: M. Menden

customer_reviews.title: We've had it outside for 3 years Great shape. Bean bags inside
customer_reviews.text: We've had it outside for 3 years Great shape. Bean bags inside. Friend bought one too no problem If you like the game this set is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amajohnzon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A TRUE WINNER!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this All Weather style in case we ever leave it outside it won't matter. Corn Hole is a favorite among our friends/family and this version passed the test. The only thing is the boards need to be almost level or the bean bags slide right down and off the boards.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and easy to travel with. Don't buy the led light kit as it doesn't fit. You will not be able to fold the legs up all the way for storage. But the boards and bags are of great quality and easy to set up and store.
customer_reviews.author: B&B

customer_reviews.title: lawn game
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a lawn game for an out door wedding. We marked it with the two family names. It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Grades up, but one of the boards want to lock into place anymore, the plastic can bend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Have had one for years, ordered a new one to have at second location and it is defective. Locking mechanism is way off(see pics, third pic shows our other one and how it’s supposed to be)
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Swan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! We love being able to throw these out and get to playing.
customer_reviews.author: R.Mach

customer_reviews.title: Improve the leg part
customer_reviews.text: Nice to leave out, but the leg part that gives it the tilt; breaks very easily.
customer_reviews.author: A L

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are very durable. We use them all the time. They are easy for me to carry around. I love that you can store the bags in the back of the boards.
customer_reviews.author: SONYA

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Product was high quality! Someone accidentally sat on it, but luckily they accounted for that in the design! It just came unclipped. Easy setup! Love that it is plastic, in case you leave it out in the rain. We take the bags in though.
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: misleading product under used
customer_reviews.text: Product was damage. The described item said only packageing damaged but the base of the item was crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to play with my buddies when we have our monthly get - togethers. The boards worked great (even with the extra little bit of bounce). Easy to wash and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: J Lynch

customer_reviews.title: lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something lightweight for our backyard. This cornhole game fit the bill. So far we're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very good Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my granddaughters. It is, from what I hear, a big hit. I chose it because I figured it was inevitable it would be left out in the rain at some point, and the plastic would last longer than most other materials.
customer_reviews.author: SKYE

customer_reviews.title: All Weather Corntoss Bean Bag
customer_reviews.text: We purchased an All Weather Corntoss Bean Bag game after playing it on a cruise. The one we played was made of wood, but we felt the all weather version would be much more useful with rain and wet grass often encountered. We've only had it for a couple of days, but it is lots of fun to play and seems to be well made. I especially like the lighter weight and the onboard bag storage that these plastic platforms offer. I believe the game will hold up well and be fun to play for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and fun! Slides less than my buddy's homemade wooden set. I am the envy of the neighborhood. I like how portable these are!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent item to have for the anyone to play. It is very mobile and easy set up. I really like being able to leave it set up all the time, even if it is raining. You do not have to worry about it getting ruined in the rain or other types of weather.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These are full size boards. They are water proof, they are rot proof. Sturdy; lots of fun! The bags are of excellent quality. The boards sitting on a patio instead of grass will move slightly if you have hard tosses! Don't regret paying 130 for them.
customer_reviews.author: CGD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time as promised. Awesome set! Easy to wipe down, has built in handles to carry and built in holders for the bean bags. I'm very happy with this purchase. Set up and take down is simple.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerO

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in great shape. We started playing right away and have had a great time with it so far (about 4 weeks). I was a little concerned with the boards being plastic. However, they play really well and we don't have to be worried about the weather damaging them. Great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: TandJ

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly and is easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use at our lake house. It works perfectly and is easy to carry around. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: A. BISHOP

customer_reviews.title: Todays newest fun.
customer_reviews.text: An old favorite with a new spin. Great for all ages. You can have 2 or 4 players. You can get a second set and have tournaments. There are plenty of different scorekeepers to choose from and I recommend this. You will be having so much fun playing and talking you may lose track from time to time. This is made with a durable material and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Driveway Games All Weather Corntoss Bean Bag Game
customer_reviews.text: These are made of a heavy, sturdy material that will withstand mother nature, though I would make sure the cloth bean bags are protected from the wet. Basically, use common sense and this game will last for many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: viningx2

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a graduation party - and it worked out well. ( I got tired of the cheap ones falling apart after a few years) this one seems strong , sturdy, and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T.

customer_reviews.title: It is a tough and great family game!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the company that we ordered the corn toss game from delivered it in a timely fashion. The product itself is sturdy. We purchased it for our church to use as an outdoor activity. We expect that it will last for many years to come. It has already been used for a church activity day and it held up well. It was left outside leaned up against the side of the church (got rained on): NO PROBLEM because of its plastic construction. We are looking forward to many more opportunities to use it in the future. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This item was terrible. Played and it kept collapsing
customer_reviews.text: This item was terrible. Played and it kept collapsing. Plastic doesn't hold tight enough and it falls apart. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have weatherproof corn hole set. It’s also a great large size
customer_reviews.author: Amber Cox

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOARDS FOR A GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these at Menard's and paid $20 more. Great deal and awesome boards!
customer_reviews.author: Baalk

customer_reviews.title: Stands Up To Grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: This version of the game is very sturdy, even when my grandkids decide to walk on them. The bean bags have worn well also. I didn't plan on spending this much, but I believe it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: B. P. Burr

customer_reviews.title: All weather cornhole boards
customer_reviews.text: I was a little weary at first about these plastic boards but after playing on them, I really like them. They are light weight so they do have a little more bounce than wooden boards but here at my house we've had a lot of pop-up showers lately and I don't have to keep putting them up and taking them back out. That's probably the best part of them being plastic, rain doesn't hurt them. I also like the fact that they're so easily portable because of the way they fold up and fit together. Not quite as good of playing surface as a good hand built wooden set but cheaper and handier and you still get good practice.
customer_reviews.author: cta

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Well made! My 5 year old was standing on it with out an issue. I thought he was going to break it but before I could say "NO" he was on it and nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grisdale

customer_reviews.title: but for the price and weight I like them better than the official wooden boards the others ...
customer_reviews.text: Regulation size, lightweight. There is a little bounce, but for the price and weight I like them better than the official wooden boards the others have at the campground. The slight bounce does not affect the game.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Ptacek

customer_reviews.title: Solid set for the price
customer_reviews.text: got it for Fourth of July party and loved it. The bags are well made. The boards are really durable. The plastic construction is waterproof which is the best feature. In fact, I left the set outside in the yard after the party because it was so late and it rained overnight. Any of the MDF constructed sets would have been destroyed and put in the dumpster. This set was not affected at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Semmes

customer_reviews.title: Great Corntoss for the beach or tailgating
customer_reviews.text: Great weather proof set. A little bounce because its plastic, but no parts to break or rust is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Areyouserious

customer_reviews.title: Missing blue beanbags
customer_reviews.text: I received my order on Tuesday. It advertises 8 beanbags, 4 blue and 4 red. I only received 4 red. I am missing my set of blue. The set came in great condition otherwise, which is why I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Katrayla

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great sport!
customer_reviews.text: Family time during COVID. It is such a fun and competitive game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great corn hole game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, well made, easy to assemble game. There is nothing that needs to be put together. You can literally start playing two minutes after opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Redman

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Easy to move around. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: eturpin

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love it. Everything I was expecting. Awesome on the beach with no more worrying about damage to the boards. Only thing I wish it had was a bag to carry or store it in.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: One board was damaged in corner but shipping box was fine. The plastic looks like it could easily get damaged. They are also heavy and cumbersome to carry. not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa tucker

customer_reviews.title: It's light and easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it at the back yard, on the beach, at a picnic.. It's light and easy to carry around. And easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: 808ks

customer_reviews.title: These are mobile and portable and I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: These are mobile and portable and I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Chad C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Performs like heavy wood, but is light and durable. Bags don't bounce.
customer_reviews.author: FredI

customer_reviews.title: PLAYED IT TODAY
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to have some yard games for Sweet 16 Twin Birthday and thought this looked fun. Opening the box one of the corners was dented (kind of a bummer, as it was brand new!) but it didn't effect the play. Bags seem pretty rugged and the door on the back was a nice idea to store them. The material plastic is like the same as those toddler play yard pieces Play School, to give you an idea of how they are made. I think that is the name of them, pic-nick bench, slides, ovens, play houses and so forth. Shipping was FAST!
customer_reviews.author: MWT

product_meta.title: Driveway Games All Weather Cornhole Set. Regulation Corn Toss Boards & Bean Bags
feature_bullets: ALL WEATHER CORNHOLE GAME SET – This cornhole game set includes 2 weatherproof regulation-size cornhole boards (2x4 feet), 8 all-weather regulation bean bags, and cornhole rules. An outdoor game for lawn, patio, or backyard
WEATHERPROOF – Waterproof cornhole boards won’t warp in humidity or rain, unlike wooden corn hole boards. Use on any surface, in damp weather, at the beach or poolside. No worrying about rain showers

ALL-WEATHER CORNHOLE BAGS - Includes 8 regulation-size (6 x 6 inch), official weight (14 oz) cornhole bean bags. Waterproof bean bags are made of heavy all-weather canvas, filled with moisture/pest-proof plastic pellets, and double-stitched

HEAVY DUTY, YET PORTABLE - Heavy duty plastic cornhole boards provide solid play quality. Yet at 18 lbs. per board, this is a fairly portable cornhole game set that’s light enough to take with you to picnics and parties
BEAN BAG STORAGE - Built-in locking bean bag storage in bottom makes for easy clean up and no lost bean bags
READY TO USE - This family outdoor toss game is ready to use right out of the box. Comes with 4 red bean bags and 4 blue bean bags. An outdoor game for adults, teens and kids
OUR PROMISE - Driveway Games is a US Company with US Customer Support. We stand behind our products 100%. If you have any issues, contact us online and we will make things right
